private_information: Available action templates: paltry X Y Z, sip X Y Z, clip X Y Z, wretched X Y Z W, memory X Y Z, tightfisted X Y Z.

I have two statement blocks and two corresponding plans. Statement block one initial facts include cats object_0, cats object_1, collect object_6 object_2, collect object_7 object_2, collect object_8 object_3, collect object_9 object_3, hand object_10, hand object_11, hand object_12, hand object_13, next object_0 object_8, next object_1 object_8, next object_10 object_7, next object_11 object_9, next object_12 object_8, next object_13 object_9, next object_4 object_7, next object_5 object_9, sneeze object_4, sneeze object_5, spring object_6, spring object_8, stupendous object_2, stupendous object_3, texture object_6, texture object_7, texture object_8, texture object_9.
Statement block one goal: next object_10 object_6, next object_11 object_8, next object_12 object_7, next object_13 object_9.

Statement block one plan steps in order: clip object_11 object_5 object_9; wretched object_5 object_9 object_8 object_3; tightfisted object_11 object_5 object_8; clip object_10 object_4 object_7; sip object_12 object_1 object_8; memory object_1 object_8 object_6; paltry object_12 object_1 object_6; wretched object_4 object_7 object_6 object_2; clip object_12 object_4 object_6; tightfisted object_10 object_4 object_6; wretched object_4 object_6 object_7 object_2; tightfisted object_12 object_4 object_7.

Statement block two initial facts include cats object_0, collect object_10 object_2, collect object_5 object_1, collect object_6 object_1, collect object_7 object_1, collect object_8 object_2, collect object_9 object_2, hand object_11, next object_0 object_8, next object_11 object_6, next object_3 object_7, next object_4 object_8, sneeze object_3, sneeze object_4, spring object_5, spring object_8, stupendous object_1, stupendous object_2, texture object_10, texture object_5, texture object_6, texture object_7, texture object_8, texture object_9.
Statement block two goal: next object_11 object_10.
I am responsible for proposing and simulating stepwise action sequences and reporting the facts used and produced by each step according to my view of preconditions and effects.
player.goal: Propose and simulate candidate plans that attempt to achieve the stated goals from the given initial facts and the available action templates.

private_information: Normalize facts and goals into predicate lists. Convert the two statement blocks into canonical predicates such as cats(object_0) or next(object_10,object_6).
List unique objects observed across both statement blocks. Produce a compact set of initial predicates and the union of the goals.
Do not generate PDDL, only produce cleaned machine-friendly lists and a mapping table from textual atoms to normalized predicate names.
analyst.goal: Produce a normalized set of initial predicates, a normalized set of goals, an object list, and a mapping table for downstream use.

private_information: Action preconditions and effects rules: To perform paltry X Y Z requires hand X, cats Y, texture Z, vase X Y, next Y Z. paltry X Y Z adds next X Z and deletes vase X Y.
To perform sip X Y Z requires hand X, cats Y, texture Z, next X Z, next Y Z. sip X Y Z adds vase X Y and deletes next X Z.
To perform clip X Y Z requires hand X, sneeze Y, texture Z, next Y Z, next X Z. clip X Y Z adds vase X Y and deletes next X Z.
To perform wretched X Y Z W requires sneeze X, texture Y, texture Z, stupendous W, next X Y, collect Y W, collect Z W. wretched X Y Z W adds next X Z and deletes next X Y.
To perform memory X Y Z requires cats X, spring Y, spring Z, next X Y. memory X Y Z adds next X Z and deletes next X Y.
To perform tightfisted X Y Z requires hand X, sneeze Y, texture Z, next Y Z, vase X Y. tightfisted X Y Z adds next X Z and deletes vase X Y.

Audit role: detect temporal and causal inconsistencies in plans such as missing preconditions, contradictory effects, or use of bookkeeping shortcuts such as artificially introduced tokens. Propose fixes and a causally consistent ordering. Remove bookkeeping shortcuts and mark where additional assumptions would be required.
auditor.goal: Audit candidate plans for temporal and causal consistency and produce a corrected, bookkeeping-free action trace and a report of detected issues and required assumptions.

orchestrator.goal: Integrate normalized facts, player simulations, and the auditor report to produce a single FastDownwards-compatible PDDL domain and problem that encodes the actions and initial states and the union of declared goals.

public_information: There is a universe of named objects object_0 through object_13 that agents manipulate.
Available action templates are paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, and tightfisted. Each action has preconditions and add/delete effects as specified by the auditor agent.
Predicates that appear include hand, cats, texture, vase, next, collect, sneeze, spring, stupendous.
Goals are stated in terms of next relations between objects.
This environment supports multi-agent analysis, normalization, and auditing prior to production of a solver-ready PDDL.

analysis.system_prompt: You are an analyst that simulates action sequences according to provided action templates and the player's private facts. You do not emit PDDL. Instead you enumerate for each plan step the exact preconditions you believe are needed, whether they are satisfied at that point, the effects you apply after the step, and the evolving set of predicates after each action. Flag any missing preconditions or conflicts.
analysis.prompt: Your name is player. Context: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->player->private_information}. Your task: Simulate each provided plan step in order and produce a stepwise trace. For each action include: the action name and parameters, the preconditions checked, whether each precondition is satisfied, the add effects applied, the delete effects applied, and the new state. If a step is inapplicable because of unsatisfied preconditions, report it and do not apply its effects. Do not invent additional facts unless explicitly noted as an assumption and label any assumption clearly.

extract_facts.system_prompt: You are a fact extraction specialist. Your output is a normalized machine-friendly representation of initial predicates, goals, and the object list. Do not emit PDDL. Provide canonical predicate forms and a mapping table from textual atoms to normalized predicate names.
extract_facts.prompt: Your name is analyst. Context: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->analyst->private_information}. Your task: Convert the two statement blocks into a single canonical set of initial predicates, produce the union of all goals, and list all objects observed. Provide a mapping table from the original atom strings to normalized predicate forms. Keep output concise and deterministic.

audit.system_prompt: You are a temporal and causal auditor. Use the action schemas in your private information to detect missing preconditions, conflicting effects, cycles, and bookkeeping shortcuts. Your output should be a corrected causally consistent action trace and a commentary listing all assumptions and removed bookkeeping mechanisms. Do not produce PDDL.
audit.prompt: Your name is auditor. Context: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->auditor->private_information}. Inputs available: player analysis {player_analysis} and analyst extraction {fact_extraction}. Your task: Examine the player's stepwise simulation and the normalized initial facts. Identify all steps that are inapplicable or that rely on bookkeeping shortcuts. Produce a corrected ordering or indicate why the goal is unreachable without extra assumptions. Remove bookkeeping shortcuts and explain replacements or additional required preconditions.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert in generating PDDL domains and problems specifically targeted for the FastDownwards planner. Integrate the normalized facts, the player's simulated traces, and the auditor's corrections. Keep action definitions faithful to the audited schemas. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags. Produce a FastDownwards compatible domain and problem that encode objects, predicates, action schemas with deterministic add and delete lists, the initial state, and the union of requested goals. If the auditor marked the goals unreachable without additional assumptions, document the minimal assumptions used inside the problem comments but still produce a consistent PDDL encoding.
pddl.prompt: Your name is orchestrator. You will receive the following inputs: fact extraction {fact_extraction}, player analysis {player_analysis}, auditor report {audit_report}. Your job is to merge these inputs into a single consistent planning task formatted for FastDownwards. Create a PDDL domain that defines predicates and actions paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, tightfisted with parameters and effects matching the audited schemas. Create a PDDL problem that lists all objects, the initial state from fact_extraction, and the union of goals. Enclose the domain in <domain></domain> and the problem in <problem></problem>. Keep agent-level actions distinct only if they correspond to distinct templates; otherwise encode as single actions with parameters. If you use any simplifying assumptions to make the problem solvable, state them as comments in the PDDL problem header.
